sentences.sentence: The quest creature, Death Ravager, is no longer able to be tamed.
sentences.translation: 任务生物——死亡破坏者——现在不再能被驯服。

sentences.sentence: The Bladestorm effect from the Ravager channeling broken by refreshing paladin judgments.
sentences.translation: 刷新审判导致[破坏者]的剑风效果失效。

sentences.sentence: And when the people saw him, they praised their god. For they said, "our god has given our enemy into our hand, the ravager of our country, who has killed many of us."
sentences.translation: 众人看见参孙，就赞美他们的神说：“我们的神将毁坏我们地、杀害我们许多人的仇敌交在我们手中了。”
